Package Assignment3.businessLayer

Class OrdersBLL

java.lang.Object
Assignment3.businessLayer.OrdersBLL
public class OrdersBLL extends Object
This class represents the data access object class for the Orders class
Author:
Tudor Cristea

  • Constructor Details

    • OrdersBLL

      public OrdersBLL()
      This is the only constructor of this class. It creates a new orders data access object in order to facilitate the communication with the database

  • Method Details

    • findAllOrders

      public ArrayList<Orders> findAllOrders() throws Exception
      This method returns the list of all orders from the database
      Returns:
      the list of orders
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the orders dao

    • findOrderById

      public Orders findOrderById(int id) throws Exception
      This method returns an order that has a certain name
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the searched order
      Returns:
      the order with the specific name
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the orders dao

    • insertOrder

      public Orders insertOrder(int clientId, int productId, int quantity, int productQuantity) throws Exception
      This method computes the id of the new order, and then inserts a new order into the database
      Parameters:
      clientId - the client id of the new order
      productId - the product id of the new order
      quantity - the quantity of the new order
      productQuantity - the quantity of the product corresponding to the new order
      Returns:
      the new order
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the orders dao

    • updateOrder

      public Orders updateOrder(Orders orders, int quantity, int productQuantity, int clientId, int productId) throws Exception
      This method updates an existing order from the database
      Parameters:
      orders - the order to be updated
      quantity - the (new) quantity of the order
      productQuantity - the quantity of the product corresponding to the order
      clientId - the (new) client id of the order
      productId - the (new) product id of the order
      Returns:
      the updated order
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the orders dao

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder(Orders orders) throws Exception
      This method deletes an existing order from the database
      Parameters:
      orders - the order to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong when communicating with the orders dao
